ProductInfo.Features:
DVR Feature: 4 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial DVR with 2TB hard drive, support iPhone, Google Phone
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
Camera Feature: Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD sensor,700 TVL, Weatherproof aluminum housing, 9-22mm vari-focal lens,30 large IR LEDs, heavy duty bracket pan 360 degree tilt 90 degree
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel CCTV Surveillance DVR System Stand Alone Real Time 2000GB Hard Drive Digital Video Recorder, 4 Built-in SONY Effio CCD IR Day Night Security Cameras 700TVL, 4 Pack 50 Feet Video Power Cables, 4 Camera Power Supplies CPC
